root.name: The Egyptian Prophecy
root.description: In this educational adventure game, the Pharaoh Ramses II is nearing the end of his days. To extend his life: Ramses turns to Amon-Re, the Sun God, and begins constructing a monumental obelisk in his honor. All seems well until the fates turn against the Pharaoh! Plagued by mysterious accidents and when the overseer suffers from an inexplicable illness, the Pharaoh turns to a power priestess with the ability to traverse to divine planes of being. As the priestess Maya, players must appease the Gods, solve their riddles and test, to save the Pharaoh before it's too late!
